creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: doughnut-shaped main section, wrapped with white thread and woven with band of red and blue lines and orange, green and red pompons, bordered with red, yellow-orange, green and blue threads; long back net and short front net of twisted threads of same colors, embellished with cowrie shells; blue pompons and clusters of three shells form bottom fringe
title: Headdress
